mono.title: Mono Collection
mono.description: Mono Collection brings pure minimalism through tables crafted from the big format tiles. Simple lines and calming textures create a piece that fits effortlessly into any space, while the hand-finished details add warmth and authenticity.
mono.whyMonoDescription: Designed for modular living—pair two together for a layered coffee table moment or let a single piece anchor an entryway. Neutral palettes keep the focus on texture and proportion.

material.title: Material
material.description: Hand-poured composite with marble fragments for a mineral feel that stays cool to the touch.

finish.title: Finish
finish.description: Soft radius edges with a low-sheen sealant that resists stains without muting the speckled detail.

care.title: Care
care.description: Wipe with a damp cloth, spot clean with neutral soap. No special kits, no fussy upkeep.

mosaic.title: Mosaic Collection
mosaic.description: A celebration of craft and detail—this collection features tables built from carefully arranged small tiles. Each piece showcases rhythmic patterns, rich texture, and a handcrafted look that brings depth and character to any space.
mosaic.whyMosaicDescription: Mosaic tables stand out as functional art. Dozens of individual tiles come together to form unique tables that catch the eye and bring artistic energy into any room.

specs.paletteValue: Neutral colors, bright colors, tiles with effects

material.title: Material
material.description: Crafted from small ceramic and stone tiles set into a durable composite base, offering a textured, mineral feel.

finish.title: Finish
finish.description: Soft edges with a protective seal that resists stains while preserving tile color and detail.

care.title: Care
care.description: Wipe with a damp cloth and mild soap. No special cleaning kits or maintenance required.

mirror.title: Mirror Collection
mirror.description: Reflective surfaces that add depth, light, and modern elegance to every room. Each piece is framed with precise edges and finished to create soft glows rather than harsh glare.
mirror.detailsCopy: Layer mirror tables together or let a single accent float in a minimal space. Each surface is hand-backed to soften reflections and keep the look refined.

aboutPage.title: Built from tile, made for living.
aboutPage.subtitle: Tiles is a small studio working with marble fragments, mirror panels, and large-format slabs to create sculptural tables and objects.
aboutPage.studioIntroCopy: We prototype in a shared factory space, then finish each piece in a daylight studio where clients can review surfaces, edges, and hardware.

principles.craftCopy: We start with slabs, terrazzo fragments, and mirror panels to let the material dictate proportion, tone, and detail.
principles.scaleCopy: Every piece is drafted as a modular system so it can stretch from a single coffee table to a full lobby installation.
principles.touchCopy: Edges are sanded by hand, joints are tinted to match each surface, and every table is sealed with a soft-matte finish.

process.briefCopy: Share mood boards, floor plans, or color palettes. We translate them into rough geometry and finishes.
process.prototypeCopy: We build foam-core mockups, test tile layouts, and send photo updates or invite you to the studio.
process.installCopy: White-glove delivery, on-site leveling, and care notes so the piece ages beautifully.

aboutPage.ctaCopy: Book a session to review materials, see prototypes in person, or start a custom commission.

contactPage.subtitle: Share floor plans, rough sketches, or simple inspiration.
